WorkItem.Description:
(Copied from incorrect area.)
 
Description: The ability to print out gear lists would be very useful for those of us whose setups aren't conducive to alt-tabbing in and out of WoW.
 
Suggestion: A simple text listing would be sufficient.  Fields should include slot name, item name, gems, and enchants.
 
Head: Stormrage Coverlet   Relentless Earthsiege Diamond, Delicate Cardinal Ruby  Arcanum of Torment
 
Neck: Collar of Unending Torment   Delicate Cardinal Ruby
 
and so on.
 
Additionally, a more visual version could literally be a listing of the icons and tooltips for all the slots.
 
I'm not looking for a list of upgrade items; I simply want a text listing of the current gear setup.
 
Edit:  Sorry, but I don't seem to be able to change the Type to Feature.
WorkItem.Summary: [Feature Request] Print Out of Currently Equipped Gear

Comments.Message: What are you looking for beyond what's already provided by the exports (such as to CSV)?

The exports, at least the ones I've found, are all upgrade lists.  I simply want a list of the gear that's listed as equipped; the items that surround the Stats/Talents/Buffs/Options page.  

The left side of the screen, not the right side of the screen.
So you want to be able to print out what you currently have on, NOT anything uprade related?

What would printing out what you're currently wearing help at all?  You presumably have that gear equipped already, and can see that info in-game.

Regardless, what you're asking can be achieved through the "Comparisons > Current Gear / Enchants / Buffs" list, then selecting the "Export" menu (top right - if your window is small, it's a small arrow on the right side, next to "Filters").  You can then do a workflow similar to what's explained here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=54v0Sq-D1Q0 .  Make sure to clear out the lines that are just buffs, and you're set.

Thanks; I hadn't seen the "Current Gear" option.  While a bit convoluted, it does give me what I want.

The reason for wanting to do this is this:

My system frequently crashes when I tab out of WoW.  When I get new gear, I run it through the optimizer, then Load Optimized Gear Setup.  It's this setup that I want to print out and have handy while in game.
